title: “The Leap”
description:
The Season 1 finale deep dive is here. Jason and David waste no time unpacking the twists and revelations in “The Leap,” written and directed by David. They discuss Gaal’s epic journey home to Synnax, including the difficulties of shooting the scenes above and below water. They also talk about the implications of Hari as a deity. And they close out by touching on David’s hopes for what’s to come in Season 2. 

This is an Apple TV+ podcast, produced by Pineapple Street Studios.

https://apple.co/-Foundation
